backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining resident-related data types and comparators, including authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated descriptions of major frontend components, hooks, pages, dialogs, and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Primary production deployment checklist explaining manual, scripted, and clean redeploy procedures with backend canister start instructions.
frontend/deployment_logs/.gitkeep: Describes the purpose of the deployment logs directory and the types of log and metadata files stored there.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERSION_89.md: Historical Version 89 deployment-only checklist with build, deploy, retry script usage, and smoke tests.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes used across the frontend.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the frontend application via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/public/build-meta.json: Placeholder build metadata file overwritten during deployment with version, commit, and timestamp info.
frontend/scripts/clean_redeploy_producti: Script that performs a clean rebuild by removing caches and dist output, injects build metadata, and redeploys the frontend to production.
frontend/scripts/deploy_version_89_publi: Historical script for rebuilding and redeploying Version 89 only, including logging and canister ID extraction.
frontend/scripts/post_deploy_smoke_test_: Interactive script that guides operators through smoke tests and verifies deployment artifacts such as logs and canister IDs.
frontend/scripts/redeploy_production.sh: Builds the frontend with metadata, deploys it to the IC network, logs output, and records canister IDs.
frontend/scripts/restart_backend_caniste: Checks backend canister status and starts or restarts it on the IC network.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_VERSION_89.md: A detailed post-deployment smoke test checklist for verifying Version 89 functionality in production, covering login, authentication, and dashboard loading.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app root handling authentication, backend actor initialization, health checks, and routing.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog form for creating ADL records for a resident and submitting them via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog form for recording daily vitals, converting units and timestamps before submitting via API.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Dialog for creating medication administration records, selecting active medications and submitting them.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Dialog form for adding a medication to a resident, handling form state, validation, physician matching, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Large admin-gated dialog to create a new resident with multi-section inputs including physicians, pharmacy, insurance, and responsible persons.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog for recording a resident's weight entry with date, unit selection, notes, and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Logo component that loads an image with size/mode options and falls back to text on load failure.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsIndic: UI indicator showing frontend build info and backend canister ID with fallback handling and warnings for missing metadata.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Dialog for editing existing medication details with pre-filled fields, validation, and update mutation execution.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Large admin-only dialog component for editing resident details with prefilled fields, enum mappings, and update mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: User profile setup form collecting name and employee ID with a startup-safe save mutation and basic validation.
frontend/src/components/ResidentPhotoUpl: Empty placeholder component with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Displays a detailed startup error screen with diagnostics, stopped‑canister guidance, and retry/logout actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles and resident data with timeouts and error normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: React hook that creates a backend actor with timeouts, optional admin initialization, and exposes query state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining themes, dialog overrides, and print-specific layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Utilities for wrapping promises with timeouts and detecting specific backend, network, and timeout errors.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds normalized asset URLs using Vite’s base path and cleans duplicate slashes.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Retrieves build metadata from environment or fallback file and constructs version identifiers.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Date helpers converting between strings and nanoseconds, formatting dates, and computing ages without timezone issues.
frontend/src/lib/residentEnumMapping.ts: Maps frontend string values to backend RoomType and ResidentStatus enums and vice versa.
frontend/src/lib/startupDiagnostics.ts: Provides utilities to derive backend diagnostics from config and perform a timed health check.
frontend/src/lib/startupTimings.ts: Defines central timeout constants for various startup operations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays active and discharged residents with admin actions, error handling, and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen using Internet Identity with branding and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Shows detailed resident information with admin-gated editing and multiple record dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, shadows, keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, and runbook requirements related to backend canister uptime and restart operations.
